Document.Focus: How to give a heparin shot

QAPair.Question: Do you have information about How to give a heparin shot
QAPair.Answer: Your health care provider prescribed a blood thinning medicine called heparin. It has to be given as a shot at home. A nurse or other health professional will teach you how to prepare the medicine and give the shot. They will watch you practice and answer your questions. You may take notes to remember the details. Keep this sheet as a reminder of what you need to do.
